```go
package main 

import "fmt" 

var name, desc string 
var radius int32 
var mass float64 
var active bool 
var satellites []string 

func main() { 
  name = "Sun" 
  desc = "Star" 
  radius = 685800 
  mass = 1.989E+30 
  active = true 
  satellites = []string{ 
    "Mercury", 
    "Venus", 
    "Earth", 
    "Mars", 
    "Jupiter", 
    "Saturn", 
    "Uranus", 
    "Neptune", 
  } 
  fmt.Println(name) 
  fmt.Println(desc) 
  fmt.Println("Radius (km)", radius) 
  fmt.Println("Mass (kg)", mass) 
  fmt.Println("Satellites", satellites) 
} 

```
